posts.post_title: Green Cobb and WaJo Sov REDUCED

T206 Cobb green port PSA 1 - $4800 shipped. Multiple payment methods accepted and references available. Will consider trades for other Cobbs and top tier T206 HOFers (e.g., Cy, Matty, WaJo). Card is in the PWCC vault - can be shipped to you or transferred to your vault account.

T206 WaJo Sov 150 SGC 1 - $1800 shipped, net to me. Card is in hand and will ship USPS Priority.
